page.title: 22Trains
page.content:
The ticket office open stays open 5h30m Monday to Saturday although on Sunday they only stay open for 4hours.

In 2009/2010 the population for the train station is 2.124 million!!!!

It is located on the Portsmouth Direct Line which runs between London (London Waterloo) and Portsmouth (Portsmouth Harbour). Havant is served by trains operated by South West Trains, Southern, and First Great Western.

It therefore has services to Portsmouth, London Waterloo, London Victoria via Gatwick Airport, Brighton, Southampton and less frequent long-distance services to Wales and the west country.
George + Chloe
